Reviews.Title: It has hardware problems
Reviews.Author: Sandra Rios
Reviews.Content: I received the laptop and it had a problem with the power button. The OS was not user friendly for my kids so I ended up storing the laptop for like 6 months. Now it does not even start. It looks like it has problems with the mother board.

Reviews.Title: Nothing to say
Reviews.Author: LIHUAPENG
Reviews.Content: I have to restart when I start it at the first time everyday, and when it works, it's so hot! It's the first time I bought aN electronic product online. So disappointed !!!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: César Sevilla
Reviews.Content: This product Dell Inspiron i13z-9318sLV 13-Inch Laptop is very goodI am very happy with the performed of this product

Reviews.Title: Dell from Nesro's
Reviews.Author: shikoh
Reviews.Content: Will give it just 2 stars the laptop is nice and thin as I wanted the only problem is over-heating I always like to us my laptop on my lap but I cant because of how is burning me will return it as soon as possible.
